summary: This is an email exchange between Sigrid McCawley, a partner at Boies Schiller Flexner LLP, and an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York regarding the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell. The AUSA attaches an order regarding the trial date and promises further updates.

persons.name: Sigrid McCawley
persons.context: Partner at Boies Schiller Flexner LLP, recipient of an email from the U.S. Attorney's Office regarding the Ghislaine Maxwell case.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Subject of the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, referenced in the email subject and body.

connections.description: McCawley is a defense attorney from Boies Schiller Flexner LLP corresponding about the Maxwell case, indicating a legal representation relationship.

events.title: Trial Date Order Issued
events.description: The Assistant United States Attorney attaches an order regarding the trial date in the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell.

keyFacts: Sigrid McCawley of Boies Schiller Flexner LLP is involved as defense counsel in the Ghislaine Maxwell criminal case.
The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York is communicating about a trial date order for the Maxwell case.
The email is dated May 3, 2021, indicating ongoing legal proceedings at that time.
